title: Mads on a Mission: Pedersen Blows Everybody Away in Provence, Lays Warning for Spring Classics
content:
Lidl-Trek doubles up as Pedersen scores stage win and GC lead in Provence, Elisa Balsamo wins bunch kick in Valenciana.

Read the full article at Mads on a Mission: Pedersen Blows Everybody Away in Provence, Lays Warning for Spring Classics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
